patthana18.8:4.1: Hetuṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:4.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.8:5.1: Nahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:6.1: Hetuṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.8:7.1: Nahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:8.1: Hetuṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:8.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana18.8:9.1: Nahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:10.1: Hetuṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:10.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana18.8:11.1: Nahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
